publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2666 Mr Brian Monteith: Innovative Philosophy Classes at Sunnyside Primary School, Alloa-That the Parliament warmly congratulates the headteacher, Paul Cleghorn, and the teaching staff at Sunnyside Primary School, Alloa, Clackmannanshire, for being the first school in the country to introduce an innovative programme of philosophy classes aimed at developing pupils' thinking and questioning skills. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-2666 Innovative Philosophy Classes at Sunnyside Primary School, Alloa (lodged on 30 January 2002) Mr George Reid*

S1M-2666 Mr Brian Monteith: Innovative Philosophy Classes at Sunnyside Primary School, Alloa-That the Parliament warmly congratulates the headteacher, Paul Cleghorn, and the teaching staff at Sunnyside Primary School, Alloa, Clackmannanshire, for being the first school in the country to introduce an innovative programme of philosophy classes aimed at developing pupils' thinking and questioning skills. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding, Mr George Reid
S1M-2666 Innovative Philosophy Classes at Sunnyside Primary School, Alloa (lodged on 30 January 2002) Robin Harper*, Murdo Fraser*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2666 Innovative Philosophy Classes at Sunnyside Primary School, Alloa (lodged on 30 January 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2666 Innovative Philosophy Classes at Sunnyside Primary School, Alloa (lodged on 30 January 2002) Pauline McNeill*
